Text: i would seed had the engine been more 3dish, 2d games are sooooooo SNES......

Enterbrain should make a 3D game creation engine w/ add-ons & all that. but 4 now i guess i'll have 2 deal w/ the 2d games.
SNES had quite a few awesome games.
Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past & then there's the Mortal Kombat series.
Dude, Thank you so much for this torrent. :)

@n2kmaster

This is an add-on, which you would only need if you had the full program. In which case, you'd already know that it was 2D. Plus, SNES was the heyday of RPG's, so check your whining before you comment. To Drislen, thanks loads!
